text:
Is death the great equalizer? No, a @GlobeSpotlight report reveals. Death exposes inequities in income, race, and opportunity that shape life down to its final hours. It’s a truth the pandemic underscored — one hard to see, as it’s easier to look away.
https://t.co/bLXJG3bBX2
